squidpony.squidgrid.gui

Class TextCellFactoryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.TextCellFactoryBuilder

  • public class TextCellFactoryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to set the properties desired in a TextCellFactory object on creation. The builder defaults to using the JVM's default Serif font at size 12, no padding, and antialias on. If more vertical padding is needed, it is recommended to try adding it mostly to the top. Often a padding of 1 on top can give a good appearance. If the width and height are set then the factory will size the cells to those dimensions rather than to the font size. In this case the font size is treated as an upper limit, and so a small font size in a large cell will render at that font size, but a large font size in a small cell will be shrunk until it can fit inside the defined cell size.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
